description.name: Contabo Cloud
description.tagline: Contabo Cloud Automation By WHMCSModule Networks
description.short: Contabo Cloud module enables bridge between your WHMCS instane with Contabo portal for ease of use and automation of cloud instances.
description.long:
This module can be used to auto provisioning of Contabo Cloud instances. 

This module supports the following actions at provisioning time:

* Instant Activation of Cloud Server on Payment received
* Automatic Suspension/ Unsuspension/ Termination of the VM
* Power On/Power Off/Reboot of Instance
* IP/ OS Rebuild Management

In all cases, in addition to the itemised action.

[Learn more »](https://www.whmcsmodule.net/contabo-cloud-automation)
